title: Kate Middleton reveals Princess Charlotte is 'pretty good with heat' as she discusses royal's taste
text:
The Duchess of Cambridge revealed Princess Charlotte is 'pretty good' with heat as she discussed the little royal's fiery taste in food yesterday.

Kate Middleton, 37, made the confession while visiting the Aga Khan centre in London yesterday, and revealed all about her family's preference for spice.

Speaking to the 2017 winner of MasterChef, Dr Mahmood Ahmed, the mother-of-three admitted it's 'hard' to cook curry for everyone in the family, because they all enjoy a different level of spice.

She admitted to a liking for 'quite hot' curry and added that Princess Charlotte, four, is also 'pretty good' with heat.

Kate Middleton, 37, revealed Princess Charlotte. 4, has a fiery taste in food, saying the little royal is 'pretty good with heat'

The Duchess of Cambridge told how her daughter was 'pretty good' with heat, while saying she also enjoyed hot food

During the visit, which came ahead of the couple's upcoming royal tour of Pakistan, Kate said: 'It's so hard cooking curry in the family, the children have a portion with no spice.

Referring to William, she said: 'Yours is medium, and I quite like it hot. Still, Charlotte is pretty good with heat.

The Duke chimed in to agree that he likes the aroma of spices, but doesn't like his curries too fiery.

'Me and heat not so good,' he said. 'I love spice but not heat.'

Kate made the revelation during a visit to Aga Khan centre yesterday alongside Prince William, who said he was 'no good' with hot food

The Duchess admitted yesterday she found it 'hard' to cook curry for her family, as they often preferred different levels of spice

Referring to the upcoming official visit, the duke appeared to be looking forward to eating the local cuisine - saying he will need to bring 'a bigger suit' with a 'bit of expansion' for the trip.

Yesterday's event saw the couple are hosted by the Aga Khan, 82, at an event to showcase modern Pakistani culture ahead of their official visit to the country later this month.

The duke and duchess are due to carry out a royal tour of Pakistan from October 14 to 18.
description: Kate Middleton, 37, made the confession while visiting the Aga Khan centre in London yesterday, and revealed all about her family's preferences when it comes to spicy foods.
